original_text: One day as Jesus was standing by the Lake of Gennesaret, the people were crowding around him and listening to the word of God.
korean_text: 무리가 몰려와서 하나님의 말씀을 들을새 예수는 게네사렛 호숫가에 서서

sentences.original_text: One day as Jesus was standing
sentences.korean_translation: 어느 날 예수께서 서 계실 때

sentences.original_text: the people were crowding around him
and listening to the word of God
